google_reviews.author: Marcos Gonzales
google_reviews.review: More than half the coin operated laundry machines are broken and machines are consistently gotten into and you'll find towels, blankets etc missing. I waited over a year for a maintenance request on a garage and some kids kicked a hole through the wall because it was fun. The garage cost me $100 a month versus the with apartment as advertised. My rooms were stolen and my vehicle towed by the city parking in the overflow where advised by property management. If you own pets expect blanket notification saying you were seeing not picking up your dog's waste regardless of whether you do or do not. They're trying to do everything they can to polish it up but attitude and community are still reflective of being directly across from a homeless community..

google_reviews.author: Bonnie Garrison
google_reviews.review: I wrote a review about three years ago. Everything in that review still stands.  At the time I didn't have any pets. I now have two cats  which I love very much. The pet policy here is very good. You can only have two, but who needs more in an apartment? If you're looking for a place to live and you have pets, kids, come here. (There may be weight/breed restrictions on certain dogs I'm not sure.)

google_reviews.author: Bonnie Garrison
google_reviews.review: I have lived at Northbrook for 25 years. It's not a bad place. Very quiet despite fact that Bennett Drive is  the road right in front. It's close to the airport but very little nose. The manager Joy is great. Friendly and upbeat. If you have the attitude that you want to work with her things will get done. Maint         guy is good and reliable. He gets repairs done quickly. (He even unclogs my bathroom sink. I have very long hair.) My neighbors are  nice and friendly.  Less than a mile from Fred Meyer and close to Bellis Fair and the freeway on ramp going both north and south.

summary.text:
Good

Northbrook Place Apartments has garnered a positive reputation among several residents for its community-oriented atmosphere and pet-friendly policies. Many user reviews highlight the pleasantness of the neighbors and the friendliness of the management staff. One long-term resident has pointed out that the property is generally quiet, maintaining a peaceful environment despite proximity to a busy road and airport. This sentiment of community and livability is echoed by others, who appreciate the overall vibe and the availability of amenities like nearby shopping centers, which enhance their living experience.

Maintenance services at Northbrook Place are frequently praised, with users noting that repairs are handled promptly and efficiently. A resident shared their appreciation for the reliability of the maintenance personnel, who address issues quickly, ensuring a comfortable living environment. Additionally, the property manager's positive attitude is noted as a critical factor in fostering a cooperative relationship with tenants, helping to resolve any concerns that may arise during their residency.

Great

Residents have expressed significant satisfaction with the Northbrook Place Apartments, particularly valuing the friendly atmosphere and supportive management. One tenant has lauded the property’s regulations concerning pets as reasonable, stating that the policies are fair and manageable. The presence of friendly neighbors contributes to a pleasant community feeling, making the apartments an attractive option for families with pets. This general sense of community is a strong theme reflected in the reviews, adding to the appeal of living here.

Furthermore, a long-term resident has shared insights about the area, pointing out the convenience of nearby amenities, such as grocery stores and easy access to transportation routes. This accessibility strikes a chord with many occupants looking for a well-located place to call home. The balance of community and convenience seems to make Northbrook Place a desirable living destination in Bellingham.

Bad

Despite the overall positive reviews, there are notable criticisms regarding Northbrook Place Apartments that potential renters should consider. One user expressed frustration over maintenance issues, specifically mentioning delayed responses to requests and problems with the laundry facilities, which were often out of order. Such maintenance neglect not only affects daily convenience but also poses safety concerns for residents, as illustrated by user experiences of broken facilities and unsatisfactory responses from management.

Parking has also been highlighted as a significant issue; residents have complained about the limited availability and first-come-first-serve policy, often leading to inconveniences while trying to find parking spaces. This concern indicates a potential drawback of the property management's ability to facilitate a smooth living experience amidst some operational flaws that could detract from tenants' overall satisfaction.

Ugly

There have been alarming reports about security and maintenance that may deter prospective residents from choosing Northbrook Place Apartments. One user review described an unsettling incident involving theft and vandalism in the garage area, exacerbated by what they deemed a lack of effective management response in addressing ongoing issues. Such experiences raise concerns about the overall safety and security of the premises, suggesting that management needs to improve their vigilance and responsiveness in these areas.

Add to this, grievances about poor communication from property management have emerged, with some users noting a lack of responsiveness to inquiries and complaints. This breakdown in communication can lead to frustration among tenants, as seen in experiences shared by those feeling unheard or neglected, which highlights the importance of effective management in maintaining resident satisfaction and trust.
